sys_script_include.name: BookUtils

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_a7d212e893030210ef267c5efaba1000
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383151_bkquest.BookUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>BookUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var BookUtils = Class.create();
BookUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    hasBeenExtended: function(bookId) {
        var borrowGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_borrow');
        borrowGR.addQuery('book_id', bookId);
        borrowGR.addQuery('borrow_status', 'extend');
        borrowGR.query();
        return borrowGR.hasNext();
    },

    type: 'BookUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-24 07:36:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>a7d212e893030210ef267c5efaba1000</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>BookUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a7d212e893030210ef267c5efaba1000</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-24 09:49:03</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
